pkgmetadata.longdescription: ICBM is a feature-rich, multithreaded Perl ICB client using a minimalistic Curses interface. It extends the usual icb feature set to add irc-style /queries, and optionally supports client-to-client encryption if the required supporting modules are installed. It requires Perl built with ithreads support.

use.flag: Install the prerequisites for encryption support if not already present.
